overview: Follows Jack and Amy, robots who were always meant to provide assistance to their creatorâ€™s son Sam, but when their creator suddenly passes away, the two sentient cyborgs must go against their programming and try to find a family for Sam. While Jack, Amy, and Sam attempt to blend in among modern suburbia, they hilariously discover that they may actually be the family they have been looking for all along.
title: Meet The MacHines
